name: LED Evolution Limited
description:
Welcome to LED Evolution. The Natural Selection for LED Lighting.

LED Evolution brings together decades of engineering expertise and manufacturing skill to produce high technology energy saving lighting products of the finest quality. 

LED Evolution is a UK based LED (light emitting diode) luminaire design and manufacturing 
company focused on bringing innovation into lighting by providing high power, energy efficient 
and cost effective LED based lighting solutions. Backed by many years of knowledge in the 
specific design of advanced LED lighting and decades of industrial manufacturing skill, we deliver 
high quality, high output, certified and affordable energy efficient LED lighting products.

With the most advanced technology and full customer support, LED Evolution brings peace of mind 
in the pursuit of affordable and reliable energy saving lighting solutions.
